author: Sunitha Sekar
text:
A toll-free number for the Chennai airport may soon be made available for passengers.

Airport director Deepak Shastri said, “We are working on starting the toll free number soon. There is some work left to be done before it is launched. Passengers will be able to get information related to flights and other details.”

No clarity

It is not clear if the toll-free number will also deal with complaints, sources said.

K. Neha, a first-time flyer in Chennai, said that she found it difficult to get any flight-related information when she travelled to Delhi from Chennai airport sometime ago.

“In such situations, a toll-free number would be of great help to passengers,” she added.

title: Toll-free number for Chennai airport soon
